thread.title: Post-Brexit passport to be made in the EU

title: Post-Brexit passport to be made in the EU
text:
Post-Brexit passport to be made in the EU 5:41pm GMT - 01:40 
The new blue British passports that Prime Minister Theresa May hailed as ''an expression of our independence and sovereignty'' after Brexit will be made by a Franco-Dutch firm, the boss of the British company which lost the contract said on Thursday. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
